title: LBSH Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview 02 Senior Resident Post
description: Lal Bahadur Shastri Hospital (LBSH) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, Post-Graduation, and Diploma courses can grab this chance and apply for the LBSH Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the addres...
